title: ARE YOU KIDDING ME RIOT?????????
body:
I want to petition for you to get rid of this god damn timer to start a match. This is seriously getting out of hand. Do I have to be subjected to this shit every time I want to start a fricken game? Is this really necessary?

GET RID OF THE SILLY DAMN MATCH STARTING TIMER AND JUST HAVE SOMETHING LIKE ...............


SEARCHING FOR A GAME

FINDING A MATCH 

This is just ridiculous. I'm sick of this non sense every time I want to play a game to be subjected to all these 


2's and 3's and 4's and 7's and 8's and 9's

replies.body: What the hell are you even talking about? Is this a joke post?
This is the second post he's made about this. He thinks there's some conspiracy about the time ticking to a specific digit before getting into a game. Must be smoking something good.

> [{quoted}](name=Hauling Ashe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=k2AYITAF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-15T00:34:14.566+0000)
>
> This is the second post he's made about this. He thinks there's some conspiracy about the time ticking to a specific digit before getting into a game. Must be smoking something good.

I have noticed a key point in conspiracy theories and similar is an inability to see or even imagine a situation from the perspective of anyone else or the world as a whole. It leads to some spectacularly crippled logic.
